meta.name: Levantine
meta.tagline: protect your messages from shoulder surfers by making them illegible
meta.description: levantine automatically obfuscates all messages into a format illegible to others (by default, a weird mixture of japanese and english). you can supply a custom mappings file to change this.

removeArticles.description: Removes articles (words like "a", "an", and "the") from sentences to conform more to Japanese grammar

replaceSeparators.description: Uses the custom mapping (default: "の") to replace spaces between words that aren't mapped.

replaceNumbers.description: Converts numbers to those listed in the mappings (e.g. 1234 -> 一二三四)
